name: Rdesc
tagline: A repository for R related initiatives at the Dorset Environmental Science Centre
body: The [Dorset Environmental Science Centre](http://desc.ca/) is an environmental science facility consisting of government, university and non-governmental partners. Through monitoring and research, we collaborate on a broad spectrum of topics related to Ontario's inland aquatic ecosystems and the watersheds in which they reside.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
